document_data.name: Conjure Earth Elemental
document_data.Effects: This spell conjured a native from the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]] to assist the caster. The reverse of this spell, '''''dismiss earth elemental''''', sent the summoned creature back home.
document_data.Casting: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: ''Conjure earth elemental'' fell out of use in the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic]], when deities started granting the more diverse ''[[planar ally]]'' spell.<ref><ref><ref>
